content.raw: I used `ExternalProject_Add_Step` in a2113e0997c9, which does cause cmake to reconfigure if those CMakeLists.txt files are changed, but you have to explicitly list every file you depend on. I've added the 5 CMakeLists.txt files that I know are required, but I think they also depend on some of the macros defined in the `build/cmake0` folder. I don't think it's scalable to add all those files unless we did some kind of glob
